scripts.report:serve:local: npm run sharedlib:build && ng serve InspectionReport-Public --port 4200
scripts.report:serve:staging: npm run sharedlib:build && ng serve InspectionReport-Public -c staging --port 4200
scripts.report:serve:prod: npm run sharedlib:build && ng serve InspectionReport-Public -c production --port 4200
scripts.report:build:local: npm run sharedlib:build && ng build InspectionReport-Public
scripts.report:build:staging: npm run sharedlib:build && ng build InspectionReport-Public -c staging
scripts.report:build:prod: npm run sharedlib:build && ng build InspectionReport-Public -c production
scripts.mycar:serve:local: npm run sharedlib:build && ng serve MyCar --port 4201
scripts.mycar:serve:staging: npm run sharedlib:build && ng serve MyCar -c staging --port 4201
scripts.mycar:serve:prod: npm run sharedlib:build && ng serve MyCar -c production --port 4201
scripts.mycar:build:local: npm run sharedlib:build && ng build MyCar
scripts.mycar:build:staging: npm run sharedlib:build && ng build MyCar -c staging
scripts.mycar:build:prod: npm run sharedlib:build && ng build MyCar -c production
